mapper.update: update events_stages_current set END_EVENT_ID = #{endEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVENT_NAME = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMER_START = #{timerStart,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TIMER_END = #{timerEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TIMER_WAIT = #{timerWait,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WORK_COMPLETED = #{workCompleted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WORK_ESTIMATED = #{workEstimated,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NESTING_EVENT_ID = #{nestingEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE = #{nestingEventType,jdbcType=CHAR} where THREAD_ID = #{threadId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select THREAD_ID, EVENT_ID, END_EVENT_ID, EVENT_NAME, SOURCE, TIMER_START, TIMER_END, TIMER_WAIT, WORK_COMPLETED, WORK_ESTIMATED, NESTING_EVENT_ID, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE from events_stages_current
